name: Elevator Ritual
description: Yup! Yup! It's here!! The new Horror-RPG game has arrived!! Talks about Naysilla, a maid, who has to deal with unusual things after she does a strange ritual. Can she find out what has happened and get out from all those bizarreness?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
